name: Venum Kontact Ankle Support Guard
short_description: ESSENTIAL ANKLE SUPPORT - The Venum Kontact Ankle Guard offers compressive support and stabilization for Muay Thai, kickboxing, taekwondo, karate, Jiu-Jitsu, MMA, plus other martial arts and sports. Essential protection at unbeatable value.

TRAIN WITH CONFIDENCE - Strike the heavy bag or your opponent with greater force and confidence wearing the supportive Venum Kontact Ankle Guard. This brace will help you avoid injury while performing at your highest level.
ACCELERATED RECOVERY - This ankle brace offers personalized compression to enhance blood circulation, reduce inflammation and promote recovery after training.

MOISTURE WICKING COMFORT - Crafted from soft, moisture-wicking elasticated cotton, the Venum Kontact Ankle Guards help keep your feet dry and comfortable so you can grip and move safely and with stability.
AVOID SCRATCHES AND ABRASIONS - Full coverage of your ankles can help avoid mat burns, abrasions and scratches during contact sports.
ACHIEVE THE PERFECT FIT - Our ankle compression sleeves are versatile, with the one-size universal fit and just the right amount of stretch for both men and women.

EASY-ON SLEEVE - The Venum Kontact Ankle Guard is designed with elasticated cotton that is easy to put on and take off. An open heel ensures you maintain contact with the ground for stability at the heel and ball of your foot.
SHIPS AS A PAIR - Each packet includes a pair of ankle guards for your convenience.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS - Hand wash or wash in a cool cycle, immediately after use. Hang dry. Do not tumble dry.
